item.title: Serendipity Capital Acquisition Corp S-1
item.description: Serendipity Capital Acquisition Corp, which is in the Blank Checks [6770] industry, SEC S-1 filing on May 07, 2021 had 72559 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: business - 1666 instances shares - 1453 instances combination - 1262 instances initial - 992 instances may - 963 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
